quotes.quote: A circle is the reflection of eternity. It has no beginning and it has no end - and if you put several circles over each other, then you get a spiral.
Circle are praised, not that abound, In largeness, but the exactly round.
A circle is the longest distance to same point.
The circle of the return to birth can only remain open, but this is a chance, a sign of life, and a wound.
Until he extends his circle of compassion to include all living things, man will not himself find peace.
You will never outperform your inner circle.
All truth is crooked, time itself is a circle.
Describe a circle, stroke its back and it turns vicious.
The circle of our understanding is a very restricted area.
It's unfair of a circle to accuse the angle of being sharp.
A circle is a round straight line with a hole in the middle.
The circle is the fundamental geometry of open human communication.
All things from eternity are of like forms and come round in circle.
Don`t turn around in circles for making circles do not equate making progress.
Circles, like the soul, are neverending and turn round and round without a stop.
Life is a full circle, widening until it joins the circle motions of the infinite.
In a narrow circle the mind grows narrow. The more one expands, the larger their aims.
Draw a circle, not a heart, around the one you love because a heart can break but a circle goes on forever.
There is an imaginary circle drawn around every human being, over which no government should be able to step.
The spiral is a spiritualized circle. In the spiral form, the circle, uncoiled, has ceased to be vicious; it has been set free.
Everybody's got a different circle of competence. The important thing is not how big the circle is. The important thing is staying inside the circle.
The limited circle is pure.
In measuring a circle, one begins anywhere.
The circle of divine love has not remained closed.
Could it be that my circle is largely black and that it is why I am influential in black circles but not in white circles?
Who runs in circles never gets far.
Dark circles are my charisma though.
We are all joined in a circle of stories.
If you cut corners you just keep on going in circles.
Life is a nonstop circle; learn to live it from the first round.
Giving never moves in a straight line - it always moves in circles.
Life is a circle. The end of one journey is the beginning of the next.
A circle may be small, yet it may be as mathematically beautiful and perfect as a large one.
Life is sort of a circle. You come back to a lot of the interests that you had early in life.
Suppose time is a circle, bending back on itself. The world repeats itself, precisely, endlessly.
A great deal of beauty is rapture. A circle is a necessity. Otherwise you would see no one. We each have our circle.
